shuddha wu bayibalaya: yeramiya - parichchedaya 35 yoshiyage puthrawu yudahi rajawu yehoyakimge dawaswaladi swaminwahansegen yeremiya wethata pamini wachanaya meya: 2 numbaa rekabwarunge wanshaya langata gos owun samanga kathakota, swaminwahansege gruhaye athul geyakata owun kandawagena awith, owunta mudrikapanaya bonta dennayi kiya. 3 ekala mama habashshiniyage puthraya wana yeremiyage puthrawu yasaniyada ohuge sahodarayanda ohuge siyalu puthrayanda rekabwarunge mulu wanshayada andagasagena, 4 swaminwahansege gruhayehi shallumge puthrawu doratupalayawu mayaseyage athulgeta ihalin thibunawu, adhipathinge athul geta yawa thibunawu, dewiyanwahansege manushyaya wana igdaliyage puthrawu hanange puthrayange athulgeta awith, 5 mudrikapanaya purawa thibunu bhajana saha kusalan rekab wanshaye puthrayan idiriyehi thaba: mudrikapanaya bonnayi kimi. 6 numuth owhu: api mudrikapanaya nobomha.
